definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_show_totemlike_animation"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Crucifixo</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">TOTEM</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Crucifixo</field></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
